name: Neon Isometric Grid #24
description: A captivating 3D isometric grid of eighteen colorful cubes arranged in a staggered pattern against a deep black background. Each cube features three visible faces with vibrant gradient colors: an orange-to-red top face, a pink-to-purple left face, and a blue-to-teal right face, creating a striking geometric pattern with a retro-futuristic aesthetic.
